Question: Which of the following SQL queries uses the "WHERE" clause correctly to retrieve all rows where the "age" column is greater than 30?
Which is the proper SQL Syntax?
CorrectAnswer: FROM Song WHERE Artist IS NULL OR Title IS NULL;
Option1: FROM Song WHERE Artist IS NULL AND WHERE Title IS NULL;
Option2: FROM Song WHERE Artist IS NULL OR Title NULL;
Option3: FROM Song WHEN Artist IS NULL AND WHEN Title IS NULL;
